Based on your preferences, I would recommend "Life of Pi" (2001) starring Pei-Pei Cheng and Sihung Lung.

The movie follows a young man who survives a disaster at sea and is then hurtled into an epic journey of adventure and discovery. While cast away, he forms an unexpected connection with another survivor: a fearsome Bengal tiger.

The movie has received critical acclaim for its stunning visuals, captivating storyline, and outstanding performances by the actors.

Overall, "Life of Pi" (2001) is a visually stunning, captivating story, and outstanding performance by the actors. It is definitely worth watching.
